headline: FedEx Tariff Lawsuits Put Refund Commitments And Investor Risks In Focus
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) has filed a lawsuit against the U.S. government seeking tariff refunds after a Supreme Court ruling invalidated emergency tariffs. The company is the first major U.S. corporation to pursue these refunds in court, putting its tariff practices under national scrutiny. Customers and shippers have launched class action lawsuits seeking similar refunds on shipments handled by FedEx. FedEx has publicly committed to returning any refunded tariff amounts to affected customers, with...
